pullrequest.title: address issue #494 and issue #1143 for simbody

content.raw:
All the physics tests and the regression passed just fine in my box.

In order to test the links, I just launched gazebo with simbody support and create a PR2. Insert a cube that touches the PR2 arms but the whole thing is frozen. I was able to reproduce with from the 3.0 branch so it is not related to this PR. I will create and issue for tracking this.
content.html:
All the physics tests and the regression passed just fine in my box.

In order to test the links, I just launched gazebo with simbody support and create a PR2. Insert a cube that touches the PR2 arms but the whole thing is frozen. I was able to reproduce with from the 3.0 branch so it is not related to this PR. I will create and issue for tracking this.
